item.description:
I know this is short notice but the weather for tomorrow night is looking real nice.  Here is the plan; a chance to see some Fall foliage a Sunset and a night flight home.  Fly to Laconia (KLCI) 62.9 miles and have dinner at Patricks pub.  The restaurant is located a short walk down the road.  If the runway in use is 26, after landing take a left and taxi back Southwest (road side) and park on the side in the grass,  just short of the run up area.  Wheels up at 6:00 and don't forget to check with the briefer for possible TFR's.

www.airnav.com/airport/KLCI

www.patrickspub.com

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Laconia Fly Out and Dinner at Patrick's Pub
